column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The food was great
column2: but seating was limited.  The areas set up for bar seating along the windows was cramped and basically impossible to sit at if you didn't want to be part of a tabletop's backdrop (have your rear in the other diners' faces).  You can't put seats right on top of your other guests!!! I would also suggest having some laminated menus available for people waiting in line (especially if they are outside in the rain).
